resources.string: Submitted and saved! Thank you! You can now continue to the next video or task.
Q1. After watching the video, select the most appropriate emoticon from the below options.
Q2. Did you feel better or worse than you were feeling before after watching the video?
Q3. On a scale of 0-5, how strong is this feeling? Mark 0 if your answer was "Same" for the above question.
